Rename Express VI Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

From the Create or Edit Express VI dialog box, click the Rename button to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to rename an Express VI.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • New Express VI Name—Renames the Express VI with the name you enter.
  • Parent Directory—Saves the Express VI in the directory you specify. The default directory is user.lib\_express. If you save Express VIs in this directory, they appear on the palette and in the Create or Edit Express VI dialog box.
Note  (macOS and Linux) The default location for Express VIs you create is the LabVIEW default data directory because not all users can write to the user.lib directory.
